title: Integrated E-Learning-Based Remote Science Education System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Theories and Experience with LMS Utilization
context.additional_context: Customized online courses for enhancing scientific domain competencies. Asynchronous learning environment leveraging learner-owned devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can explain interactions among the four core elements (instructional methods, technology, teaching, and learning) of an integrated e-learning model
Learners can specify activity sequences and evaluation methods based on LMS when designing remote education in science fields
Learners can propose at least two interaction strategies for small learner groups in BYOD environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
